article.headline: Mercer 75, Loyola Marymount 52
article.story: LOS ANGELES -- E.J. Kusnyer connected on eight 3-pointers and scored 25 points to lead Mercer past winless Loyola Marymount 75-52 Monday night. Mercer (7-5) led 34-22 at the half and took a commanding lead in the first six minutes of the second half with an 18-8 run. Kusnyer, who was 8-for-14 from 3-point range, capped the rally with a 25-foot 3. LMU (0-13) mounted a mild comeback late in the second half, narrowing a 22-point Mercer lead to 11 with four minutes to play before the Bears made their finishing run. Daniel Emerson led Mercer with 16 rebounds. LaRon Armstead led Loyola Marymount with 20 points.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
